mother: Jacoba Elisabet Meyntjies VAN DEN BERG
source: Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Graaff-Reinet, Baptism register, 1792-1805, page 17, entry number 191. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch. Transcribed by Cornel Viljoen, with consent of the NGK Archives, from Family Search Film # 008121018, image number 22.
searchParameters: Child with smit anywhere in the surname with Jacobus Johannes Poulus anywhere in the first name in all the registers.
